availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Leeds Houpt (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, railroad agent and entrepreneur)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, railroad agent and entrepreneur. Pennsylvania native. Married to Louisa C. Keller Houpt. Father of Charles Houpt, Harry Houpt, and William Houpt. Agent for the Pennsylvania Railroad Company in 1860 and 1861. Founding member of the Hardwick Oil Company in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Philadelphia County, Philadelphia, Ward 15, p. 176; McElroy's Philadelphia City Directory, 1861 (Philadelphia: Sherman & Co., 1861), 1207; Find A Grave, "Lewis Leeds Haupt (1826-1898)," Memorial #143658961, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=143658961&ref=acom (accessed May 10, 2017).
